title: Mortality after admission with pneumonia is higher than after admission with an exacerbation of COPD.
abstract: Mortality after an admission for pneumonia is considerably higher than for an admission for an exacerbation in COPD patients recruited from usual clinical practice. A proper diagnosis in acute worsenings of symptoms in COPD is therefore important. https://bit.ly/3LyhnnC
